roleset.name: bring up to date
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to update.01-v. Consitant with VN class tell-37.2. No FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The transport crew received the update that the patient was having severe back and chest pain.
example.arg: that the patient was having severe back and chest pain
